If you’d like to watch episodes of your favorite TV show on USA Network or watch USA Network’s live streaming service (the USA Now), you should note that both platforms are region-locked. If you try to watch either from outside of the US, you’ll encounter the following message:

“Please sign in with your TV provider to unlock live TV viewing”.

As a result, you’ll need a Virtual Private Network (VPN) to watch USA Network abroad. A VPN encrypts your device’s internet traffic, routing it through a server in another location. By hiding your true location and providing you with a new, temporary IP address, VPNs let you access geo-restricted websites and services such as USA Network and USA Now from anywhere.

Best VPNs for USA Network: Testing Methodology

There are hundreds of VPNs on the market, and they are not all suitable for streaming USA Network abroad. To guarantee we only recommend reliable VPNs capable of providing the online freedom and privacy you need, we carefully review market-leading VPNs using a precise VPN testing methodology.

We check under the hood to ensure the VPN has robust encryption. This ensures the VPN will protect your data against hackers on public wifi. It will also guarantee that you have privacy against nosey businesses and even government snoops.

Below, we have included a list of features we looked for when recommending VPNs for USA Now:

US servers that work to access USA Network as well as other leading TV platforms and streaming services abroad. Global servers to access popular sites from other countries is also a bonus.

High-speed servers and fast protocols such as Wireguard let you stream without buffering in HD quality.

Apps for all devices to let you watch USA Network, Netflix, Hulu, or whatever takes your fancy from wherever you are.

Secure encryption to prevent anybody from monitoring what you do online.

Plenty of advanced privacy and security features make the VPN good value for money.

A no-logs policy ensures the VPN is never keeping records about what you do while connected.

How to watch USA Network live online from anywhere with a VPN

You might be surprised just how easy it is to use a VPN to unblock USA Network and its USA Now streaming service. Just follow this step-by-step guide.

How to use a VPN to watch USA Network (USA Now) online:

First, sign in to USA Network or USA Now via your US TV provider. You’ll need to enter the username or email address and password you use with your TV provider.

Download the USA Network/USA Now app (it’s available on Google Play and the App Store).

Next, sign up with a VPN service with servers in the US – we particularly recommend NordVPN.

Download an app or browser extension from your preferred VPN service, making sure it’s the correct version for your operating system.

Open the VPN app or browser extension and connect to a server in the US in order to obtain a US IP address.

Go to the USA Now app or USA Network website and select your preferred content which should now be unblocked.

Still having trouble? Try clearing your browser’s cache and cookies, and you may also want to try connecting to a different US server. if you’re still struggling, contact your VPN provider’s support team.
